device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
contribution_desc: Proposes a system that maintains a session across devices. Allows users to resume website visits on a different device. Operates a discovery protocol for present devices and allows users to choose from a list on which device to resume a browsing activity. The user manually selects a region to be migrated to the target device. Focus on web systems and applications, apps implemented in C#. Server acts as proxy.
crossdevice_def: Cross-Device Interfaces; interactive migratory user interfaces; multi-device interfaces
